TextView.android:text: Los angeles officially the City of Los Angeles, often known by its initials L.A., is the most populous city in the U.S. state of California and the second-most populous in the United States, after New York City, with a population at the 2010 United States Census of 3,792,621.[7] It has an area of 469 square miles (1,215 km2), and is located in Southern California.
